name: Tetra Ho!
description:
You play as a block wizard who can dash around, summon tetrominos to solve puzzles and disintegrate your foes. Use your blocks as cover, as a shield, and even as a weapon to trap and kill in this action-puzzle game. Controls

WASD - Movement
Space - Dash
Left Mouse Button - Summon Tetromino
Right Mouse Button - Rotate Tetromino
Shift - Hold Piece
E - Advance Dialogue
Escape - Pause Menu

*Tip*
Dashing into enemies allows your dash to reset faster. Dashing into them will knock them back a significant distance, perfect to set up a summon, open up some space or send them into hazardous flames.

This is a submission for #mizjam1. It's my first game jam and first game with Godot; a lot of it was rushed. This game project in its entirety, including source code and all assets used are under CC0 public domain license. You are free to modify and use this work for any purpose without permission. The source code, which includes a README.md attributing all the original authors of the assets used, can be found in the GitHub repository link below.

GitHub: https://github.com/RailKill/tetraho
Time Spent: 48:00:44
